issue.title: [C++][R] R package not building on macos 10.13 with C++17 std lib
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17782](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17782). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The R package also needs `-D_LIBCPP_DISABLE_AVAILABILITY` to be able to be compiled on macos 10.13
